postBody: Participated and won Infosys Dashboard Hackathon held in February 2017. Got opportunity to work on MEAN - full stack JavaScript framework in Tool development.
Participated and won Market Visualization Hackathon held in April 2017. Got opportunity to work on MEAN - full stack JavaScript framework for XPO Logistics Client.
Certified in Certified Ethical Hacker C|EH V8 held by EC-COUNCIL.
Participated in Infosys Campus Connect Programming competition in Chandigarh.
Lucknow Zonal Winner in Hack Trick's Techfest 2013, IIT Mumbai
Certified in Web Development from Netcamp Private Limited
Certified in Network Management from Netcamp Private Limited
